IF OBJECT_ID(N'[wwi_perf].[Sale_Hash]', N'U') IS NULL
BEGIN
   CREATE TABLE [wwi_perf].[Sale_Hash]
   WITH
   (
       DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [CustomerId] ),
       CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
   )
   AS
   SELECT
       *
   FROM
       [wwi_poc].[Sale]
END

DBCC PDW_SHOWSPACEUSED('wwi_perf.Sale_Hash');

SELECT TOP 1000
    CustomerId,
    count(*) as TransactionItemsCount
FROM
    [wwi_perf].[Sale_Hash]
GROUP BY
    CustomerId
ORDER BY
    count(*) DESC

SELECT TOP 1000
    CustomerId,
    count(*) as TransactionItemsCount
FROM
    [wwi_perf].[Sale_Hash]
GROUP BY
    CustomerId
ORDER BY
    count(*) ASC

/**************/

SELECT
    T.TransactionItemsCountBucket
    ,count(*) as CustomersCount
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            CustomerId,
            (count(*) - 62) / 100 as TransactionItemsCountBucket
        FROM
            [wwi_perf].[Sale_Hash]
        GROUP BY
            CustomerId
    ) T
GROUP BY
    T.TransactionItemsCountBucket
ORDER BY
    T.TransactionItemsCountBucket
